title: The effect of late-life environmental enrichment on stress and anxiety: The role of sex and age-related differences in coping with aversive stimuli
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Marta Balietti, Elisa Principi, Luca Giacomini, Belinda Giorgetti, Fiorenzo Conti
